title: Indian man accused of sexually assaulting minor held in New Jersey; ICE takes custody
summary_full: An Indian national, Vodela Yashaswi Kottapalli, has been detained by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) on charges including the sexual assault of a minor in New Jersey. ICE stated he is being held pending removal proceedings, highlighting intensified actions against undocumented migrants accused of crimes.
